Question
========
One researcher claims that girls (group 1) receive less pocket money than boys (group 2). He tests this one-sided hypothesis and uses a significance level (alpha) of 5%.  
  
In this case, what is the **alternative hypothesis**?

Answerlist
----------
* H<sub>a</sub>: µ1 - µ2 &lt; 0.
* H<sub>a</sub>: µ1 ≠ µ2.
* H<sub>a</sub>: µ1 + µ2 &lt; 0.
* H<sub>a</sub>: µ1 = µ2.
* H<sub>a</sub>: µ1 - µ2 = 0.
* H<sub>a</sub>: µ1 &lt; 0.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
* False
* False
